answers.answer: Some of my favorite pictures of my little prince are of him trying to suck his thumb. My fiance and I thought we would never be able to have kids because I was diagnosed with recurring pregnancy loss. It really is heart warming to think about the moment we get to hold our baby.
My little girl is always so stubborn during the ultrasound. Any advice on how to get her to move alot.  Without a bunch of sugar since I have diabetes. I have an appointment at 3pm today im 36+6

They recommend cold water to make them move and chocolate but this one you can not eat so try cold water...:) if i touch my belly and push a lil bit or just touch her she always start kicking:) girls are more active usually than boys
Talk to her. My son loves being talked to,  especially by his dad. Wakes him right up every time. But ice cold water or even anything cold on your belly should get her moving.
Talk to her. My son loves being talked to,  especially by his dad. Wakes him right up every time. But ice cold water or even anything cold on your belly should get her moving.
I finally got a gud pic too but she looked so mad the tech woke her up lol

question: Got to finally get a great picture of my Lil boy today, he is so precious already and I know when I'm finally holding him in my arms I'm just gonna melt away and know what love is at first sight (:
title: baby boy ♡
